description: Update a major or minor version of an environment template.

parameters.name: majorVersion
parameters.description: To update a major version of an environment template, include major Version.

parameters.name: minorVersion
parameters.description: To update a minor version of an environment template, include minorVersion.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The name of the environment template.

nested_items.name: environmentTemplateVersion
nested_items.description: The environment template version detail data that's returned by Proton.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the version of an environment template was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the minor version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the version of an environment template was last modified.

nested_items.name: majorVersion
nested_items.description: The latest major version that's associated with the version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: minorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: recommendedMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The recommended minor version of the environment template.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The schema of the version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of the version of an environment template.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the version of an environment template.
